title: Acidic Avenue
content: Acidic Avenue is a room that players can enter after crafting a coated anti-acid shield during the Spider's Nest quest. Players cannot move freely in Acidic Avenue; upon entering, a cutscene shows plants spitting acid at the player, who blocks the attacks with the anti-acid shield while running to the other side. As such, the room contains 8 juniper trees that cannot be chopped down.
